query.name: net.cdolinc.user.employment.employmentList
query.sql: SELECT u_cdol_user_employment.id, u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid, u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid, CASE WHEN u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid = 0 THEN 'Diocean Office' WHEN u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid = -1 THEN u_cdol_user_employment.school_name ELSE schools.name END AS schoolname, u_cdol_user_employment.assignment, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date, u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, FLOOR( MONTHS_BETWEEN( NVL(u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, SYSDATE), u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date ) / 12 ) AS emp_years, FLOOR( MOD( MONTHS_BETWEEN( NVL(u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, SYSDATE), u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date ), 12 ) ) AS emp_months, u_cdol_user_employment.notes FROM u_cdol_user_employment LEFT JOIN schools ON schools.school_number = u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid WHERE u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid OR :selectedUserDcid = 0

query.name: net.cdolinc.user.employment.totalTime
query.description: Total Years and Months of Employment
query.sql: WITH emp_data AS ( SELECT FLOOR( MONTHS_BETWEEN( NVL(u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, SYSDATE), u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date ) / 12 ) AS emp_years, FLOOR( MOD( MONTHS_BETWEEN( NVL(u_cdol_user_employment.emp_end_date, SYSDATE), u_cdol_user_employment.emp_start_date ), 12 ) ) AS emp_months FROM u_cdol_user_employment LEFT JOIN schools ON schools.school_number = u_cdol_user_employment.schoolid WHERE u_cdol_user_employment.usersdcid = :selectedUserDcid OR :selectedUserDcid = 0 ), total_data AS ( SELECT SUM(emp_years) AS total_years, SUM(emp_months) AS total_months FROM emp_data ) SELECT total_years + FLOOR(total_months / 12) AS total_years, MOD(total_months, 12) AS total_months FROM total_data
